Actions.Name: Axe Kick
Actions.Effects: Becomes a critical hit (+[D]) against bloodied foes.

Actions.Name: Hurl Boulder
Actions.Description: A foe in range 4 takes [fray] damage, is slowed, and is shoved 1.

Actions.Name: Izuna Drop
Actions.Description: The Yaman takes a pose, then ends their turn and gains
Actions.Delay: Their next turn must be slow. At the start of that turn, they may dash 2. Then, if a foe is adjacent the Yaman grabs them, removing both of them from the battlefield, then placing both of them back in free space adjacent to each other in range 2. The foe must save. On a successful save, they take [D]+[fray] and are dazed. On a failed save, they are stunned and takes 2[D]+[fray].
